thread.title: World's greatest trick shot? Jaw-dropping snooker pot watched by millions
thread.title_full: World's greatest trick shot? Jaw-dropping snooker pot watched by millions

author: Mark Molloy
title: World's greatest trick shot? Jaw-dropping snooker pot watched by millions

organizations.name: allstars sports bar bristol / facebook  t

text:
World's greatest trick shot? Jaw-dropping snooker pot watched by millions Watch | World's greatest trick shot? Jaw-dropping snooker pot watched by millions 02:03 10 January 2017 • 6:45pm 
I s this the world’s greatest trick shot? 
Allstars Sports Bar in Bristol filmed the implausible shot which has racked up more than a million views in just 48 hours on Facebook. World's greatest trick shot? Credit: Allstars Sports Bar Bristol / Facebook 
T he impressive 500ft (152m) putt, which brilliantly combines both golf and snooker, finishes with a ball gently rolling into a hole positioned at the end of their bar. 
It took eight hours to set up the stunt, which featured over 50 snooker cues and was recorded by the bar’s general manager Shane O’Hara and bar assistant Tom Woolman, according to the BBC . 
T he bar joked on Facebook it was “the putt of the year”. 
One viewer joked about the amount of time it must have taken to set up the trick shot, commenting: “Do some people not have proper jobs any more?” 
While another added: “Amazing.. magically done..” 
S ome suggested the footage had been edited, with the sport bar responding: “Absolutely real - just takes a lot of time!” 
The bar added: “Hope you'll agree this effort trumps last year...Thanks for the interest and we hope you enjoyed it.”
